partially_covered_topics: costs (only prices shown, not cost breakdown + housing)
health (only FUNDIS mentions 'recognize good foal', no protocols)

high_opportunity_gaps.gap: Educational content on foal purchase process
high_opportunity_gaps.evidence: Only FUNDIS (Rank 6) provides guide. 4 Marketplaces + 1 Breeder + 1 Rescue + 1 Association + 1 Forum = 9 non-educational sources.
Zero SERP results mention contracts, guarantees, or legal frameworks. Critical gap.
FUNDIS mentions 'how to recognize good foal' vaguely. No detailed vet protocols.
Prices shown everywhere, but no systematic analysis (warmblood vs. coldblood, breeding value effects, age premiums).
Not mentioned anywhere. High buyer concern (common issue in online horse sales).

market_analysis.serp_fragmentation: Highly fragmented between marketplaces (60%) and niche content (40%). No dominant content authority like exists for 'pferd kaufen'.
market_analysis.content_vs_commerce: Commerce dominates (8 of 10 are selling platforms). Only 1 comprehensive guide (FUNDIS). This is OPPORTUNITY.
market_analysis.buyer_journey_coverage: Awareness/Consideration: Marketplaces + Community (Reddit). Decision: GAPS - No systematic buying guides. Post-purchase: MISSING entirely.
market_analysis.expertise_concentration: Breeders (Jacobs), Associations (Hannoveraner), Nonprofits (Rescue) provide niche expertise. No generalist trusted authority on foal buying.
market_analysis.information_quality: High-volume, low-guidance marketplace content. FUNDIS is quality outlier. Room for authoritative educational content.

pferdewert_competitive_positioning.opportunity: Create authoritative, comprehensive foal buying guide that combines: marketplace navigation + health guidance + legal templates + cost planning + red flag warnings.
pferdewert_competitive_positioning.target_positioning: Position as buyer's advocate - not affiliated with any marketplace or breeder, giving unbiased guidance.
pferdewert_competitive_positioning.content_differentiation: Deeper than FUNDIS (add legal + health protocols), more systematic than Reddit (structured guide), more accessible than Breeder Sites (generalist not niche).
pferdewert_competitive_positioning.conversion_hooks: Natural transition to Pferdewert Evaluator: 'Before buying - Get free AI-powered foal assessment' or 'Link your shortlisted foal for expert evaluation'.
pferdewert_competitive_positioning.ranking_confidence: Medium-High. No dominant content competitor. Marketplaces won't directly compete on ranking (different intent). FUNDIS (Rank 6) is main competitor - can outrank with better content depth + E-E-A-T signals.
pferdewert_competitive_positioning.timeline_to_rank: Realistic: 3-6 months to Top 3 with quality content + backlinks. Established domain authority helps.

content_recommendations_summary: Go EDUCATIONAL not MARKETPLACE - fill the content gap
Add legal/contract section - zero competition, high value
Create health checking protocol - detailed, vet-sourced
Provide price matrix breakdown - systematic vs. random examples
Include red flags section - buyer safety, not elsewhere
Link naturally to Pferdewert Evaluator - logical conversion
Use tables, checklists, case studies - visual elements dominate marketplaces, add here
